title: Estimate the price of a second-hand car in Romania
howItWorksExplanation1: The application analyzes more than 1 million ads of second-hand cars put for sale in Romania, and uses machine learning to estimate an aproximate price on the market, based on the car characteristics below.
howItWorksExplanation2: The model machine learning was trained using regression with the ML.NET library.
howItWorksExplanation3: Note: The application is work in progress.
